title: section element
description: Per the HTML AAM spec, a section element will be mapped to the region role if the section element has an accessible name. Otherwise, no corresponding role. Only the `aria-label`, `aria-labelledby`, and `title` attributes can provide an accessible name.

references.title: HTML AAM role mapping for the section element
HTML AAM accessible name mapping for the section element

assertions.title: convey an appropriate role and name if it is named
assertions.reference: See HTML AAM 5.15.1 Section and Grouping Element Accessible Name Computation

assertions.title: not convey a role if it is not named
assertions.reference: HTML AAM 5.15.1 Section and Grouping Element Accessible Name Computation

assertions.title: convey boundaries if named
assertions.rationale: A user might need to differentiate content inside the region from content outside of the region
assertions.reference: HTML AAM 5.15.1 Section and Grouping Element Accessible Name Computation
